scripts.test-n8n: node -e "const N8n = require('./src/n8n-setup.js'); new N8n().validateConnection().then(ok => process.exit(ok ? 0 : 1))"
scripts.list-workflows: node -e "const N8n = require('./src/n8n-setup.js'); const n8n = new N8n(); n8n.validateConnection().then(() => n8n.getWorkflows().then(w => w.data.forEach(wf => console.log(wf.name))));"
